history.content:
EdVisorly is growing fast! We are a high-growth startup founded at UC Berkeley projected to onboard tens of thousands of users by the end of 2021. We are focused on creating a more innovative, cohesive university transfer ecosystem for students across the state. EdVisorly is a first-of-its-kind platform where community college students can increase their chances of getting into their target universities by planning and optimizing their academic courses, while connecting with classmates with similar aspirations. We are single handedly democratizing access to education, and giving students back the power of transparency. We are an ambitious team with a niche market looking to onboard forward-leaning, diligent, and talented teammates.


We are currently looking to add to our amazing team of engineers with a full-stack software engineer who specializes in MERN-stack and an algorithm engineer who is advanced in Python.


Please email all interest as soon as possible to alyson@edvisorly.com. We are excited to hear from you!
history.subject: Fast-Growing Startup Opportunities
